content.raw: Thanks for bringing this to our attention…. In our testing we were doing docker run with `-it`. Our code is executed as part of our `.bashrc`. It seems that without this flag bash does execute immediately as it does not have a terminal to attach to. I’ll look into submitting a patch
content.html: Thanks for bringing this to our attention…. In our testing we were doing docker run with -it. Our code is executed as part of our .bashrc. It seems that without this flag bash does execute immediately as it does not have a terminal to attach to. I’ll look into submitting a patch
